info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 4:18PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Fremont County through 500 PM MDT... At 418 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Royal Gorge, or 23 miles northeast of Hayden Pass Burn Scar, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Royal Gorge and Canon City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
